summary: Verified onboarding tour feature for CoinQuest. All 8 test cases passed. Onboarding modal shows correctly for child (7 steps) and parent (6 steps) users who haven't completed onboarding. Navigation, skip, and complete functionality all work correctly.

issues: Console warning: DialogContent requires DialogTitle for accessibility - consider adding VisuallyHidden DialogTitle

passed_tests: ✅ TEST 1: Onboarding modal appears for first-time child users (has_completed_onboarding = false/undefined)
✅ TEST 2: Onboarding modal shows 7 steps for children (Welcome, Money Jars, Quests, Store, Investments, Achievements, Learning)
✅ TEST 3: Next/Back navigation works between steps
✅ TEST 4: Progress dots show current step and allow click navigation
✅ TEST 5: Skip button closes the onboarding and calls /api/auth/complete-onboarding
✅ TEST 6: Completing onboarding (Let's Go! button) calls /api/auth/complete-onboarding
✅ TEST 7: Onboarding does NOT appear for users who have already completed it
✅ TEST 8: Onboarding does NOT appear for teacher/admin roles
✅ BONUS: Parent onboarding shows 6 steps with parent-specific content

verified_features.child_onboarding: 7 steps: Welcome, Money Jars, Quests, Store, Investments, Achievements, Learning
verified_features.parent_onboarding: 6 steps: Welcome, Connect with Child, Chores & Rewards, Allowances, Give Money, Track Progress
verified_features.navigation: Next/Back buttons and progress dot clicks work correctly
verified_features.skip_functionality: Skip button closes modal and marks onboarding complete
verified_features.complete_functionality: Let's Go! button on last step closes modal and marks onboarding complete
verified_features.role_filtering: Onboarding only shows for child/parent roles, not teacher/admin/school

action_items: MINOR: Add VisuallyHidden DialogTitle to OnboardingTour for accessibility compliance
critical_code_review_comments: OnboardingTour.jsx correctly implements role-based step content (childSteps vs parentSteps)
shouldShowOnboarding logic correctly checks role and has_completed_onboarding flag
API call to /api/auth/complete-onboarding is made on both skip and complete actions
Progress dots are clickable and navigate to correct steps
Back button correctly disabled on first step
seed_data_creation: Created test sessions for admin, teacher, and parent users
context_for_next_testing_agent: Onboarding tour feature fully tested and working. Child users see 7 steps, parent users see 6 steps. Onboarding is controlled by has_completed_onboarding flag in user document. Test child user (aashim.6898@gmail.com) has completed onboarding. To re-test, unset has_completed_onboarding field in MongoDB.
